casebody.data:
NATIONAL LIGHTERAGE CORPORATION, Appellee, v. TRANSMARINE CORPORATION, Appellant. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 21, 1929. No. 15. William J. Mahar and Single & Single, all of New York City, for appellant. William E. Purdy and John E. Purdy, both of New York City, for appellee.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed, on the authority of Hildebrandt v. Flower Lighterage Co. (D. C.) 277 F. 436; Hastorf v. Ocean Transp. Corp. (D. C.) 4 F.(2d) 583, affirmed 4 F.(2d) 584 (C. C. A. 2); O’Brien Bros. v. City of New York (C. C. A.) 9 F.(2d) 542.
